Docs.param: The name of the Azure resource group that contains the Data Lake Analytics account.
The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to add or replace the compute policy.
The name of the compute policy to create or update.
Parameters supplied to create or update the compute policy. The max degree of parallelism per job property, min priority per job property, or both must be present.
The headers that will be added to request.
The cancellation token.
Docs.summary: Creates or updates the specified compute policy. During update, the compute policy with the specified name will be replaced with this new compute policy. An account supports, at most, 50 policies
